name: wayward-tweaks
description: A grab bag of general changes to the base game.
author: Jeremy Osborne <jeremywosborne@gmail.com>

scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && rsync -av --progress --exclude resources --exclude node_modules --exclude .git . ~/Library/Application\ Support/Steam/steamapps/common/Wayward/mods/wayward-mod-learnings
